About Me

BIO

I am a front-end web developer who focuses on writing clean, efficient code. I have a passion for designing functional and elegant experiences that will keep your customers coming back for more! I am proficient in HTML5, CSS3, Sass, JavaScript (ES6) with object oriented programming, & jQuery.
